name: SPENDOTRON: 2019
description:
SPENDOTRON: 2019

Arcade shooter where everything has a price

How to play...

Use WASD to move + Mouse to shoot.

You start with $3

Bullets are't free! They cost 1 cent each. 

You get 1 cent back for each kill.

Collect copyrights for extra cash, each one is worth 5 more!

Death cost $1
